entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
